Accessed on 16 November 2018. | demographics1_title1 = Total | demographics1_info1 = €9.372 billion (2016) | demographics1_title2 = Per capita | demographics1_info2 = €11,753 (2016) | iso_code = SK-KI | registration_plate = | timezone1 = CET | utc_offset1 = +1 | timezone1_DST = CEST | utc_offset1_DST = +2 | blank_name_sec1 = | blank_info_sec1 = | blank1_name_sec1 = | blank1_info_sec1 = | blank2_name_sec1 = | blank2_info_sec1 = | website = | governing_body = County Council of Košice Region }} The Košice Region () is one of the eight regions of Slovakia. The capital is Košice. The region has 11 districts: Gelnica, Košice–okolie, Michalovce, Rožňava, Sobrance, Spišská Nová Ves and Trebišov and 4 districts of Košice (Košice I – Košice IV, which create the city of Košice). There are 440 municipalities in the region. == Population == == References == == Other websites == *
title: Košice Region
